objTypes.name: Cancelling
objTypes.objection: I'm sorry, I'm not going to be able to make this appt.
objTypes.wordTrack: Not a problem.  I'll go ahead and cancel your appointment.  I have openings later this week, or we can reschedule for a later date. What works best for you?
